title: What is this matchmaking??
body:
Okay this happens to me very often and I dont know why - im currently doing my first Placements - I got level 30 last week.
But very often I think the Matchmaking is very unfair - last game we had one guy silver last season and the enemy team got 3 gold and 1 platin Season 4.
How is this even possible - our team was full of players that are kinda new to the game (me included) and we are playing against platin dudes in our Placements - how?

replies.body:
Weil das hier das deutsche Forum ist.

B2T: Weil wegen Matchmaking. Alles stimmt wie es ist, muss dich nicht dar√ºber beschweren.
